'''''Amon Hen'' 50''' is the fiftieth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published on 2nd May [[1981]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''Untitled''
** By: Steve Lines
* Editorial
** By: [[Brin Dunsire]]
* Oxonmoot
** By: Susan Rule
* Summermoot
** By: [[Jonathan Simons|Jon Simons]]
* AGM Report
** By: [[Helen Armstrong]]
* History of Amon Hen
** By: [[Vera Chapman|Belladonna Took]] and [[Brin Dunsire]]
* Artwork: ''Lúthien''
** By: Margaret Thomson
* Archive Reprints
* [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|Radio]] Reviews
* An Unmentioned Tale
** By: Andrew Sutherland
* Hobbit-at-Law
** By: [[Brin Dunsire]]
* Early Welsh Poetry
** By: Iwan Rhys Morus
* Pippin Patch Answers
** By: [[John D. Rateliff|John Rateliff]]
* Genesis of sub-creation
**By: Virginia Luling
* Serendipity
** By: Madawc Williams
* Best Sellers Lists
** By: John Holmes
* [[Shire Calendar 1981|Shire Calendar]]
** By: Steve Pillinger
* Ripples in a Pool
** By: Andrew Sutherland
* Artwork: ''Gerontius Took''
** By: Dora Baggins
* Review: Urshurak
** By: Paul Harwood
* Back Issues
* Review: The New Tolkien Newsletter
** By: Jessica Yates
* Artwork: ''Galadriel''
** By: Steve Lines
* Review: ''Symboliek van Tolkien’s In de ban van de ring''
** By: [[Johan Vanhecke]]
* Smial Please
* Tolk Folk
* Olórin
** By: Takashi Okunishi
* The Hitch-hikers Guide to Tolkien Societies
** By: Brin Dunsire 
* Letters/Penfriends
* Helen's Heep
** By: [[Helen Armstrong]]
* Brin's Bundle
** By: [[Brin Dunsire]]
